plot outline: IPC Section 300 is a 2009 Indian Kannada film, directed by "Shashikanth" and Produced by "R Shankar".The film Stars "Devaraj, Vijay Raghavendra, Priyanka, Suman Ranganath, Srujan Lokesh, Sumithra, Preethi Chandrashekar", in lead roles. The film had musical score by "Veer Samarth". Watch the full Movie, IPC Section 300 , online, only On Eros Now.
